title: Games
lyrics:
Mondays, you're cold
Not even the thought of me crosses your mind
Tuesdays, i'm old news
Say you moved on cause our love has expired
Wednesday came and Thursday went away
But Friday nights reminded you of me



Why is it on the weekend you get all weak

And blowing up my phone

Saying you hate being alone?

Why when you were the one that said we were done?

I should be blowing up your phone

Saying i hate being alone



You must love breaking my heart

It's your favourite game

You must love pulling me apart

It's your favourite game



It's like i'm the dice

You keep on gambling me all the time

I can't deny that

I'd bet a million to see you tonight

But I know its a weekday so you won't reply

You know that you'd rather keep me hanging on the line



Why is it on the weekend you get all weak

Start blowing up my phone

Saying you hate being alone?

Why when you were the one that said we we're done?

I should be blowing up your phone

Saying I hate being alone



You must love breaking my heart

It's your favourite game

You must love pulling me apart

It's your favourite game



Why is it on the weekend you get all weak

Start blowing up my phone

Saying you hate being alone

Why when you were the one that said we were done

I should be blowing up your phone

Saying I hate being alone



You must love breaking my heart

It's your favourite game

You must love pulling me apart

It's your favourite game
